item.title: Mk2 Films Partners With Juliette Binoche on Directorial Debut ‘In-I In Motion,’ Charting Her Creative Journey With Akram Khan (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Mk2 Films has partnered with Juliette Binoche on her directorial debut, “In-I In Motion,” which is set to premiere out of competition at San Sebastián and Busan film festivals. The Paris-b
